summary:
Mozilla Firefox, or Firefox, is a free web browser used on computers and mobile devices. It was made by the Mozilla Foundation and is based on the old Netscape Navigator. Firefox is known for its speed, security, and customizable add-ons. It works on Windows, macOS, Linux, and mobile operating systems like Android and iOS.

Firefox was very popular when it first came out in 2004, taking on Microsoft's Internet Explorer. Though its use has gone down over time, especially with the rise of Google Chrome, it remains a preferred choice for many due to its features and open-source nature.
title: Firefox
